title: Region Transfer
body: Hey ive spent a bunch of money on this account and want to switch it to EUNE.I knew i wasnt able to when it was Pre-Season but its the new season now and i still cant change the region.Any updates on this topic?

replies.body:
There have been a couple updates as they figure things out, but since they are having problems getting transfers 100% working again it's obviously a little hard to pinpoint an exact date as to when it'll be smoothed out. It'd be a huge disservice to slap a random date on something and that turn out to be false y'know? 

[**HollyMonster was able to provide an update**](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/help-support/rlu6awv4-transfer-service-update) not too long ago mentioning that they're shooting for late Jan/early Feb, and there should be some kind of discount as well.
Last Update : "late January or Early February", at this time I don't trust Riot, they postponed it 3 times already. :)
